mapper.select: select id, subject_id, subject_answer, created_by, created_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted from subject_brief where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into subject_brief(subject_id, subject_answer, created_by, created_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted) values (#{subjectId}, #{subjectAnswer}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{isDeleted})

insert into subject_brief(subject_id, subject_answer, created_by, created_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted) values
(#{entity.subjectId}, #{entity.subjectAnswer}, #{entity.createdBy}, #{entity.createdTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted})

insert into subject_brief(subject_id, subject_answer, created_by, created_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted) values
(#{entity.subjectId}, #{entity.subjectAnswer}, #{entity.createdBy}, #{entity.createdTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted})
on duplicate key update subject_id = values(subject_id), subject_answer = values(subject_answer), created_by = values(created_by), created_time = values(created_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time), is_deleted = values(is_deleted)
mapper.update:
update subject_brief
subject_id = #{subjectId},
subject_answer = #{subjectAnswer},
created_by = #{createdBy},
created_time = #{createdTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
where id = #{id}
